3324 /**
3325 * Sets up the WebGL needed to render the depth map for this light source. Only used for spot lights which produce shadows
3326 * @private
3327 */
3328 GLGE.Light.prototype.createSpotBuffer=function(gl){
3329     this.frameBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
3330     this.renderBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
3331     this.texture = gl.createTexture();
3332     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture);
3333 
3334     try {
3335         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
3336     } catch (e) {
3337         var tex = new WebGLUnsignedByteArray(this.bufferWidth * this.bufferHeight * 4);
3338         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGBA, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight, 0, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
3339     }
3340     
3341     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.frameBuffer);
3342     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
3343     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT, this.bufferWidth, this.bufferHeight);
3344     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
3345     
3346     gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture, 0);
3347     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderBuffer);
3348     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
3349 }

3515 /**
3516 * Method gets the current projection matrix of this camera
3517 * @return {Matrix} Returns the camera projection matrix
3518 */
3519 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getProjectionMatrix=function(){
3520 	if(!this.pMatrix){
3521 		switch(this.type){
3522 			case GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE:
3523 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makePerspective(this.fovy, this.aspect, this.near, this.far);
3524 				break;
3525 			case GLGE.C_ORTHO:
3526 				this.pMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-this.orthoscale*this.aspect,this.orthoscale*this.aspect,-this.orthoscale,this.orthoscale, this.near, this.far);
3527 				break;
3528 		}
3529 	}
3530 	return this.pMatrix;
3531 };
3532 /**
3533 * Method generates the projection matrix based on the 
3534 * camera paramaters
3535 * @param {Matrix} projection The new projection matrix
3536 */
3537 GLGE.Camera.prototype.setProjectionMatrix=function(projection){
3538 	this.pMatrix=projection;
3539 };
3540 /**
3541 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
3542 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
3543 * @type Matrix
3544 */
3545 GLGE.Camera.prototype.updateMatrix=function(){
3546 	var position=this.getPosition();
3547 	var vMatrix=GLGE.translateMatrix(position.x,position.y,position.z);
3548 	vMatrix=vMatrix.x(this.getRotMatrix());
3549 	this.matrix=vMatrix.inverse();
3550 };
3551 /**
3552 * Method generates the cameras view matrix
3553 * @return Returns the view matrix based on this camera
3554 * @type Matrix
3555 */
3556 GLGE.Camera.prototype.getViewMatrix=function(){
3557 	if(!this.matrix || !this.rotmatrix) this.updateMatrix();
3558 	return this.matrix;
3559 };

3753 * @property {GLGE.Object} object The object to be added

3756 GLGE.Scene.prototype.addObject=function(object){	
3757 	object.scene=this;
3758 	//set the scene index for picking
3759 	object.sceneIndex=this.objects.length;
3760 	this.objects.push(object);
3761 	if(this.renderer) object.GLInit(this.renderer.gl);
3762 	return this.objects.length-1;
3763 }

3771 	this.groups.push(object);
3772 	object.scene=this;
3773 	var subs=object.getObjects();	
3774 	for(var i=0;i<subs.length;i++){
3775 		this.addObject(subs[i]);
3776 	}
3777 
3778 };

3781 * @property {GLGE.Light} light The light to be added

3784 GLGE.Scene.prototype.addLight=function(light){	
3785 	light.scene=this;
3786 	this.lights.push(light);
3787 	if(this.renderer && light.type==GLGE.L_SPOT && !light.texture){
3788 		light.createSpotBuffer(this.renderer.gl);
3789 	}
3790 }
3791 /**
3792 * used to initialize all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
3793 * @private
3794 */
3795 GLGE.Scene.prototype.init=function(){
3796 	//sets the camera aspect to same aspect as the canvas
3797 	this.camera.setAspect(this.renderer.canvas.width/this.renderer.canvas.height);
3798 
3799 	this.createPickBuffer(this.renderer.gl);
3800 	this.renderer.gl.clearColor(this.backgroundColor.r, this.backgroundColor.g, this.backgroundColor.b, 1.0);
3801 	
3802 	//get objects to init
3803 	var initObject=this.objects;
3804 	
3805 	for(var i=0;i<initObject.length;i++){
3806 		initObject[i].GLInit(this.renderer.gl);
3807 	}
3808 	for(var i=0;i<this.lights.length;i++){
3809 		if(this.lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT && !this.lights[i].texture){
3810 			this.lights[i].createSpotBuffer(this.renderer.gl);
3811 		}
3812 	}
3813 }
3814 /**
3815 * used to clean up all the WebGL buffers etc need for this scene
3816 * @private
3817 */
3818 GLGE.Scene.prototype.destory=function(gl){
3819 }
3820 /**
3821 * renders the scene
3822 * @private
3823 */
3824 GLGE.Scene.prototype.render=function(gl){
3825 	//if look at is set then look
3826 	if(this.camera.lookAt) this.camera.Lookat(this.camera.lookAt);	
3827 	
3828 	//animate groups
3829 	for(var i=0;i<this.groups.length;i++) if(this.groups[i].animation) this.groups[i].animate();
3830 	
3831 	//shadow stuff
3832 	for(var i=0; i<this.lights.length;i++){
3833 		if(this.lights[i].castShadows){
3834 			gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.lights[i].frameBuffer);
3835 			gl.viewport(0,0,this.lights[i].bufferWidth,this.lights[i].bufferHeight);
3836 			gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
3837 			var cameraMatrix=this.camera.matrix;
3838 			var cameraPMatrix=this.camera.getProjectionMatrix();
3839 			this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(this.lights[i].getPMatrix());
3840 			this.camera.matrix=this.lights[i].getModelMatrix().inv();
3841 			
3842 			//draw shadows
3843 			for(var n=0; n<this.objects.length;n++){
3844 				if(!this.objects[n].zTrans) this.objects[n].GLRender(this.renderer.gl, GLGE.RENDER_SHADOW);
3845 			}
3846 			gl.flush();
3847 			this.camera.matrix=cameraMatrix;
3848 			this.camera.setProjectionMatrix(cameraPMatrix);
3849 			
3850 			gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
3851 		}
3852 	}
3853 
3854         gl.viewport(0,0,this.renderer.canvas.width,this.renderer.canvas.height);
3855 
3856 	
3857 	var renderObject=this.objects;
3858 	//original stuff
3859 	gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
3860 	if(this.camera.animation) this.camera.animate();
3861 	for(var i=0;i<this.lights.length;i++){
3862 		if(this.lights[i].animation) this.lights[i].animate();
3863 	}
3864 	this.renderer.gl.disable(this.renderer.gl.BLEND);
3865 	var transObjects=[];
3866 	for(var i=0; i<renderObject.length;i++){
3867 		if(!renderObject[i].zTrans) renderObject[i].GLRender(this.renderer.gl,GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT);
3868 			else transObjects.push(i)
3869 	}
3870 	this.renderer.gl.enable(this.renderer.gl.BLEND);
3871 	for(var i=0; i<transObjects.length;i++){
3872 		renderObject[transObjects[i]].GLRender(this.renderer.gl, GLGE.RENDER_DEFAULT);
3873 	}
3874 	
3875 	
3876 	
3877 }
3878 /**
3879 * Sets up the WebGL needed create a picking frame and render buffer
3880 * @private
3881 */
3882 GLGE.Scene.prototype.createPickBuffer=function(gl){
3883     this.framePickBuffer = gl.createFramebuffer();
3884     this.renderPickBuffer = gl.createRenderbuffer();
3885     this.pickTexture = gl.createTexture();
3886     gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture);
3887 
3888     //TODO update when null is accepted
3889     try {
3890         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGB, 1, 1, 0, gl.RGB, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, null);
3891     } catch (e) {
3892         var tex = new WebGLUnsignedByteArray(3);
3893         gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, gl.RGB, 1, 1, 0, gl.RGB, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE, tex);
3894     }
3895     
3896     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framePickBuffer);
3897     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBuffer);
3898     gl.renderbufferStorage(gl.RENDERBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_COMPONENT, 1, 1);
3899     gl.bindRenderbuffer(gl.RENDERBUFFER, null);
3900     
3901     gl.framebufferTexture2D(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT0, gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.pickTexture, 0);
3902     gl.framebufferRenderbuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, gl.DEPTH_ATTACHMENT, gl.RENDERBUFFER, this.renderPickBuffer);
3903     gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
3904 }
3905 /**
3906 * Picks and object from canvas coords
3907 * @param x the canvas x coord to pick
3908 * @param y the canvas y coord to pick
3909 */
3910 GLGE.Scene.prototype.pick=function(x,y){
3911 	if(!this.camera){
3912 		GLGE.error("No camera set for picking");
3913 		return false;
3914 	}else if(this.camera.matrix && this.camera.pMatrix){
3915 		//get camera space coords
3916 		var origmatrix=this.camera.matrix;	
3917 		var origpmatrix=this.camera.pMatrix;
3918 		xcoord =  -( ( ( 2 * x ) / this.renderer.canvas.width ) - 1 ) / this.camera.pMatrix.e(1,1);
3919 		ycoord =( ( ( 2 * y ) / this.renderer.canvas.height ) - 1 ) / this.camera.pMatrix.e(2,2);
3920 		zcoord =  1;
3921 		if(this.camera.type==GLGE.C_PERSPECTIVE){
3922 			var coord=[xcoord,ycoord,zcoord,0];
3923 			coord=this.camera.matrix.inverse().x(coord);
3924 			var cameraPos=this.camera.getPosition();
3925 			var zvec=coord.toUnitVector();
3926 			var xvec=(new GLGE.Vec([0,0,1])).cross(zvec).toUnitVector();
3927 			var yvec=zvec.cross(xvec).toUnitVector();				
3928 			this.camera.matrix=new GLGE.Mat([xvec.e(1), yvec.e(1), zvec.e(1), cameraPos.x,
3929 							xvec.e(2), yvec.e(2), zvec.e(2), cameraPos.y,
3930 							xvec.e(3), yvec.e(3), zvec.e(3), cameraPos.z,
3931 							0, 0, 0, 1]).inverse();
3932 		}
3933 		if(this.camera.type==GLGE.C_ORTHO){
3934 			this.camera.matrix=this.camera.matrix.inv().x(GLGE.translateMatrix(-xcoord,-ycoord,0)).inv();
3935 		}
3936 		this.camera.pMatrix=GLGE.makeOrtho(-0.0001,0.0001,-0.0001,0.0001,this.camera.near,this.camera.far);
3937 		//render for picking
3938 		var gl=this.renderer.gl;
3939 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, this.framePickBuffer);
3940 		gl.viewport(0,0,1,1);
3941 		gl.clear(gl.COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | gl.DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
3942 		this.renderer.gl.disable(this.renderer.gl.BLEND);
3943 
3944 		for(var i=0; i<this.objects.length;i++){
3945 			this.objects[i].GLRender(this.renderer.gl,GLGE.RENDER_PICK);
3946 		}
3947 		var data=gl.readPixels(0, 0, 1, 1, gl.RGBA, gl.UNSIGNED_BYTE);
3948 		//TODO: firefox hack :-( remove when fixed!
3949 		if(data.data) data=data.data;
3950 		var index=data[0]+data[1]*256;
3951 		gl.bindFramebuffer(gl.FRAMEBUFFER, null);
3952 		gl.viewport(0,0,this.renderer.canvas.width,this.renderer.canvas.height);
3953 		
3954 		//revert the view matrix
3955 		this.camera.matrix=origmatrix;	
3956 		this.camera.pMatrix=origpmatrix;
3957 		
3958 		if(index>0){
3959 			return this.objects[index-1];
3960 		}else{
3961 			return false;
3962 		}
3963 		
3964 	}else{
3965 		return false;
3966 	}
3967

3972 /**
3973 * @class Sets the scene to render
3974 * @param {GLGE.Scene} scene The scene to be rendered
3975 */
3976 GLGE.Renderer=function(canvas){
3977 	this.canvas=canvas;
3978 	try {
3979 		this.gl = canvas.getContext("experimental-webgl",{alpha:false,depth:false,stencil:false,antialias:false,premultipliedAlpha:false});
3980 	} catch(e) {}
3981 	if (!this.gl) {
3982 		alert("What, What Whaaat? No WebGL!");
3983 		throw "cannot create webgl context";
3984 	}
3985 
3986 	//chome compatibility
3987 	//TODO: Remove this when chome is right
3988 	if (!this.gl.getProgramParameter)
3989 	{
3990 		this.gl.getProgramParameter = this.gl.getProgrami
3991 	}
3992 	if (!this.gl.getShaderParameter)
3993 	{
3994 		this.gl.getShaderParameter = this.gl.getShaderi
3995 	}
3996 	// End of Chrome compatibility code
3997 	
3998 	//set up defaults
3999 	this.gl.clearDepth(1.0);
4000 	this.gl.enable(this.gl.DEPTH_TEST);
4001 	//this.gl.enable(this.gl.SAMPLE_ALPHA_TO_COVERAGE);
4002     
4003 	this.gl.depthFunc(this.gl.LEQUAL);
4004 	this.gl.blendFuncSeparate(this.gl.SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA,this.gl.ZERO,this.gl.ONE);
4005 	
4006 	//this.gl.enable(this.gl.CULL_FACE);
4007 	
4008 };
4009 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.gl=null;
4010 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.scene=null;
4011 /**
4012 * Gets the scene which is set to be rendered
4013 * @returns the current render scene
4014 */
4015 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.getScene=function(gcene){
4016 	return this.scene;
4017 };
4018 /**
4019 * Sets the scene to render
4020 * @param {GLGE.Scene} scene The scene to be rendered
4021 */
4022 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.setScene=function(scene){
4023 	scene.renderer=this;
4024 	this.scene=scene;
4025 	scene.init();
4026 };
4027 /**
4028 * Renders the current scene to the canvas
4029 */
4030 GLGE.Renderer.prototype.render=function(){
4031 	this.scene.render(this.gl);
4032 };

4055 /**
4056 * @class The material layer describes how to apply this layer to the material
4057 * @param {number} texture the texture index to apply to the layer
4058 * @param {number} mapto how to map this layer on to the material see M_XXXXX constants
4059 * @param {number} mapinput the UV layer to map to, UV1 or UV2
4060 * @param {Object} scale how much scaling the texture eg {x: 10, y:10, z:1}
4061 * @param {Object} offset how much to offset the texture eg {x: 10, y:10, z:1}
4062 * @see GLGE.Material
4063 * @augments GLGE.Animatable
4064 */
4065 GLGE.MaterialLayer=function(texture,mapto,mapinput,scale,offset){
4066 	this.texture=texture;
4067 	this.mapinput=mapinput;
4068 	this.uv=mapinput;
4069 	this.blendMode=GLGE.BL_MIX;
4070 	this.mapto=mapto;
4071 	if(scale){
4072 		this.setScaleX(scale.x);
4073 		this.setScaleY(scale.y);
4074 		this.setScaleZ(scale.z);
4075 	}
4076 	if(offset){
4077 		this.setOffsetX(offset.x);
4078 		this.setOffsetY(offset.y);
4079 		this.setOffsetZ(offset.z);
4080 	}
4081 	this.scale=scale;
4082 	this.offset=offset;
4083 };
4084 GLGE.augment(GLGE.Animatable,GLGE.MaterialLayer);
4085 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.texture=null;
4086 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.blendMode=null;
4087 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapto=GLGE.M_COLOR;
4088 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.mapinput=GLGE.UV1;
4089 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleX=1;
4090 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetX=0;
4091 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotX=0;
4092 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleY=1;
4093 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetY=0;
4094 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotY=0;
4095 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.scaleZ=1;
4096 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.offsetZ=0;
4097 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.rotZ=0;
4098 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleX=0;
4099 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetX=0;
4100 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotX=0;
4101 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleY=0;
4102 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dOffsetY=0;
4103 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dRotY=0;
4104 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.dScaleZ=0;

4109 /**
4110 * Gets the textures used by the layer
4111 * @return {GLGE.Texture} The current shininess of the material
4112 */
4113 GLGE.MaterialLayer.prototype.getMatrix=function(){
4114 	if(!this.matrix){
4115 		var offset=this.getOffset();
4116 		var scale=this.getScale();
4117 		var rotation=this.getRotation();
4118 		this.matrix=GLGE.translateMatrix(offset.x,offset.y,offset.z).x(GLGE.scaleMatrix(scale.x,scale.y,scale.z).x(GLGE.rotateMatrix(rotation.x,rotation.y,rotation.z)));
4119 	}
4120 	return this.matrix;
4121 };

4171 	var offset={};
4172 	offset.x=parseFloat(this.getOffsetX())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetX());
4173 	offset.y=parseFloat(this.getOffsetY())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetY());
4174 	offset.z=parseFloat(this.getOffsetZ())+parseFloat(this.getDOffsetZ());
4175 	return offset;
4176 };

4500 	this.layers=[];
4501 	this.textures=[];
4502 	this.lights=[];

4504 	this.specColor={r:1,g:1,b:1};
4505 	this.reflect=0.8;

4509 	this.alpha=1;

4687 	}
4688 	this.specColor={r:color.r,g:color.g,b:color.b};
4689 };

4784 /**
4785 * Generate the fragment shader program for this material
4786 * @private
4787 */
4788 GLGE.Material.prototype.getFragmentShader=function(lights){
4789 	var shader="";
4790 	var tangent=false;
4791 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
4792 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT || lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
4793 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightvec"+i+";\n"; 
4794 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 tlightvec"+i+";\n"; 
4795 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 lightpos"+i+";\n"; 
4796 			shader=shader+"varying vec3 tlightdir"+i+";\n"; 
4797 			shader=shader+"varying float lightdist"+i+";\n";  
4798 			shader=shader+"varying vec2 spotCoords"+i+";\n"; 
4799 		}
4800 	}
4801 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 n;\n";  
4802 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 b;\n";  
4803 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 t;\n";  
4804 	shader=shader+"varying vec4 UVCoord;\n";
4805 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 eyevec;\n"; 
4806 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 OBJCoord;\n";
4807 	shader=shader+"varying vec3 teyevec;\n";
4808 
4809 	//texture uniforms
4810 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
4811 		shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+i+";\n";
4812 	}
4813 	var cnt=0;
4814 	var shadowlights=[];
4815 	var num;
4816 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
4817 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightcolor"+i+";\n";  
4818 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightAttenuation"+i+";\n";  
4819 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotCosCutOff"+i+";\n";  
4820 			shader=shader+"uniform float spotExp"+i+";\n";  
4821 			shader=shader+"uniform vec3 lightdir"+i+";\n";  
4822 			shader=shader+"uniform mat4 lightmat"+i+";\n";
4823 			shader=shader+"uniform float shadowbias"+i+";\n";  
4824 			shader=shader+"uniform bool castshadows"+i+";\n";  
4825 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
4826 				num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
4827 				shader=shader+"uniform sampler2D TEXTURE"+num+";\n";
4828 				shadowlights[i]=num;
4829 			}
4830 	}
4831 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){		
4832 		shader=shader+"uniform mat4 layer"+i+"Matrix;\n";  
4833 	}
4834 	
4835 	shader=shader+"uniform vec4 baseColor;\n";
4836 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 specColor;\n";
4837 	shader=shader+"uniform float shine;\n";
4838 	shader=shader+"uniform float specular;\n";
4839 	shader=shader+"uniform float reflective;\n";
4840 	shader=shader+"uniform float emit;\n";
4841 	shader=shader+"uniform float alpha;\n";
4842 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 amb;\n";
4843 	shader=shader+"uniform float fognear;\n";
4844 	shader=shader+"uniform float fogfar;\n";
4845 	shader=shader+"uniform int fogtype;\n";
4846 	shader=shader+"uniform vec3 fogcolor;\n";
4847 	shader=shader+"uniform float far;\n";
4848 	shader=shader+"uniform mat4 uNMatrix;\n"; 
4849     
4850 	shader=shader+"void main(void)\n";
4851 	shader=shader+"{\n";
4852 	shader=shader+"float att;\n"; 
4853 	shader=shader+"int texture;\n"; 
4854 	shader=shader+"float mask=1.0;\n";
4855 	shader=shader+"float spec=specular;\n"; 
4856 	shader=shader+"vec3 specC=specColor;\n"; 
4857 	shader=shader+"vec4 texturePos=vec4(1.0,1.0,1.0,1.0);\n"; 
4858 	shader=shader+"vec2 textureCoords=vec2(0.0,0.0);\n"; 
4859 	shader=shader+"vec4 spotCoords=vec4(0.0,0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
4860 	shader=shader+"float ref=reflective;\n";
4861 	shader=shader+"float sh=shine;\n"; 
4862 	shader=shader+"float em=emit;\n"; 
4863 	shader=shader+"float al=alpha;\n"; 
4864 	shader=shader+"vec4 normalmap= vec4(n,0.0);\n"
4865 	shader=shader+"vec4 color = baseColor;"; //set the initial color
4866 	shader=shader+"float pheight=0.0;\n"
4867 	shader=shader+"vec2 textureHeight=vec2(0.0,0.0);\n";
4868 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
4869 		shader=shader+"textureCoords=vec2(0.0,0.0);\n"; 
4870 		
4871 		if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV1 || this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.UV2){
4872 			shader=shader+"texturePos=vec4(vec2(UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2)+"],(1.0-UVCoord["+(this.layers[i].mapinput*2+1)+"])),1.0,1.0);\n";
4873 		}
4874 		
4875 		if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_NORM){
4876 			shader=shader+"texturePos=vec4(n.xyz,1.0);\n";
4877 		}
4878 		if(this.layers[i].mapinput==GLGE.MAP_OBJ){
4879 			shader=shader+"texturePos=vec4(OBJCoord.xy,1.0);\n";
4880 		}
4881 		
4882 		shader=shader+"textureCoords=(layer"+i+"Matrix * texturePos).xy+textureHeight;\n";
4883 			
4884 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_COLOR) == GLGE.M_COLOR){			
4885 			if(this.layers[i].blendMode==GLGE.BL_MUL){
4886 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + color*texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords)*mask;\n";
4887 			}
4888 			else 
4889 			{
4890 				shader=shader+"color = color*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords)*mask;\n";
4891 			}
4892 		}        
4893 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_HEIGHT) == GLGE.M_HEIGHT){
4894 			//do paralax stuff
4895 			shader=shader+"pheight = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).x;\n";
4896 			shader=shader+"textureHeight =(0.05* (pheight-0.5)  * normalize(teyevec).xy*vec2(1.0,-1.0));\n";
4897 		}
4898 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR) == GLGE.M_SPECCOLOR){
4899 			shader=shader+"specC = specC*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).rgb*mask;\n";
4900 		}
4901 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKR) == GLGE.M_MSKR){
4902 			shader=shader+"mask = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).r;\n";
4903 		}
4904 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKG) == GLGE.M_MSKG){
4905 			shader=shader+"mask = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).g;\n";
4906 		}
4907 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKG) == GLGE.M_MSKB){
4908 			shader=shader+"mask = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).b;\n";
4909 		}
4910 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_MSKG) == GLGE.M_MSKA){
4911 			shader=shader+"mask = texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).a;\n";
4912 		}
4913 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SPECULAR) == GLGE.M_SPECULAR){
4914 			shader=shader+"spec = spec*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).r*mask;\n";
4915 		}
4916 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_REFLECT) == GLGE.M_REFLECT){
4917 			shader=shader+"ref = ref*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).g*mask;\n";
4918 		}
4919 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_SHINE) == GLGE.M_SHINE){
4920 			shader=shader+"sh = sh*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).b*mask*255.0;\n";
4921 		}
4922 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_EMIT) == GLGE.M_EMIT){
4923 			shader=shader+"em = em*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).r*mask;\n";
4924 		}
4925 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_NOR) == GLGE.M_NOR){
4926 			shader=shader+"normalmap = normalmap*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords)*mask;\n";
4927 			tangent=true;
4928 		}
4929 		if((this.layers[i].mapto & GLGE.M_ALPHA) == GLGE.M_ALPHA){
4930 			shader=shader+"al = al*(1.0-mask) + texture2D(TEXTURE"+this.layers[i].texture.idx+", textureCoords).a*mask;\n";
4931 		}
4932 	}
4933 	if(tangent){
4934 		shader=shader+"vec3 normal = normalize(normalmap.rgb)*2.0-1.0;\n";
4935 	}else{
4936 		shader=shader+"vec3 normal = normalize(n);\n";
4937 	}
4938 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvalue=amb;\n"; 
4939 	shader=shader+"vec3 specvalue=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);\n"; 
4940 	shader=shader+"float dotN,spotEffect;";
4941 	shader=shader+"vec3 lightvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
4942 	shader=shader+"vec3 viewvec=vec3(0.0,0.0,0.0);";
4943 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
4944 	
4945 		if(tangent){
4946 			shader=shader+"lightvec=tlightvec"+i+"*vec3(-1.0,-1.0,1.0);\n";  
4947 			shader=shader+"viewvec=teyevec*vec3(-1.0,-1.0,1.0);\n";  
4948 		}else{
4949 			shader=shader+"lightvec=lightvec"+i+";\n";  
4950 			shader=shader+"viewvec=eyevec;\n"; 
4951 		}
4952 		
4953 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_POINT){ 
4954 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
4955 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
4956 			shader=shader+"att = 1.0 / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
4957 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
4958 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
4959 			}
4960 			shader=shader+"}\n";
4961 			
4962 			if(lights[i].specular){
4963 				shader=shader+"specvalue += att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
4964 			}
4965 		}
4966 		shader=shader+"spotEffect = 0.0;\n";
4967 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_SPOT){
4968 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = dot(normalize(lightdir"+i+"), normalize(-lightvec"+i+"));";	
4969 			shader=shader+"if (spotEffect > spotCosCutOff"+i+") {\n";		
4970 			shader=shader+"spotEffect = pow(spotEffect, spotExp"+i+");";
4971 			//spot shadow stuff
4972 			if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow){
4973 				shader=shader+"if(castshadows"+i+"){\n";
4974 				shader=shader+"spotCoords=lightmat"+i+"*vec4(OBJCoord,1.0);";
4975 				shader=shader+"spotCoords=(vec4(spotCoords.xy/(spotCoords.z*tan(acos(spotCosCutOff"+i+"))),0.0,1.0)/2.0)-0.5;";
4976 				shader=shader+"vec4 dist = texture2D(TEXTURE"+shadowlights[i]+", -spotCoords.xy);";
4977 				shader=shader+"float depth = dot(dist, vec4(1.0, 0.00390625, 0.0000152587890625, 0.000000059604644775390625))*1000.0;\n";
4978 				shader=shader+"if(depth*shadowbias"+i+"<length(lightvec"+i+")){";
4979 				shader=shader+"spotEffect=0.0;";
4980 				shader=shader+"}\n";
4981 				shader=shader+"}";
4982 			}
4983 
4984 			
4985 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,normalize(-lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
4986 			shader=shader+"if(dotN>0.0){\n";
4987 			shader=shader+"att = spotEffect / (lightAttenuation"+i+"[0] + lightAttenuation"+i+"[1] * lightdist"+i+" + lightAttenuation"+i+"[2] * lightdist"+i+" * lightdist"+i+");\n";
4988 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
4989 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += att * dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
4990 			}
4991 			if(lights[i].specular){
4992 				shader=shader+"specvalue += att * specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
4993 			}
4994 			shader=shader+"}\n}\n";
4995 		}
4996 		if(lights[i].type==GLGE.L_DIR){
4997 			shader=shader+"dotN=max(dot(normal,-normalize(lightvec)),0.0);\n";       
4998 			if(lights[i].diffuse){
4999 				shader=shader+"lightvalue += dotN * lightcolor"+i+";\n";
5000 			}
5001 			if(lights[i].specular){
5002 				shader=shader+"specvalue += specC * lightcolor"+i+" * spec  * pow(max(dot(reflect(normalize(lightvec), normal),normalize(viewvec)),0.0), sh);\n";
5003 			}
5004 		}
5005 	}
5006 	shader=shader+"float fogfact=1.0;";
5007 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_QUADRATIC+") fogfact=clamp(pow(max((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0),2.0),0.0,1.0);\n";
5008 	shader=shader+"if(fogtype=="+GLGE.FOG_LINEAR+") fogfact=clamp((fogfar - length(eyevec)) / (fogfar - fognear),0.0,1.0);\n";
5009 	
5010 	shader=shader+"lightvalue = (lightvalue)*ref;\n";
5011 	shader=shader+"if(em>0.0) lightvalue=vec3(1.0,1.0,1.0);\n";
5012 	shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =vec4(specvalue.rgb+color.rgb*(em+1.0)*lightvalue.rgb,al)*fogfact+vec4(fogcolor,al)*(1.0-fogfact);\n";
5013 	//shader=shader+"gl_FragColor =vec4(normal,1.0);\n";
5014 	
5015 	shader=shader+"}\n";
5016 	return shader;
5017 };
5018 /**
5019 * Set the uniforms needed to render this material
5020 * @private
5021 */
5022 GLGE.Material.prototype.textureUniforms=function(gl,shaderProgram,lights){
5023 	if(this.animation) this.animate();
5024 	gl.uniform4f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "baseColor"), this.color.r,this.color.g,this.color.b,this.color.a);
5025 	gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specColor"), this.specColor.r,this.specColor.g,this.specColor.b);
5026 	gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "specular"), this.specular);
5027 	gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shine"), this.shine);
5028 	gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "reflective"), this.reflect);
5029 	gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "emit"), this.emit);
5030 	gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "alpha"), this.alpha);
5031 	var cnt=0;
5032 	var num=0;
5033 	for(var i=0; i<lights.length;i++){
5034 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightcolor"+i), lights[i].color.r,lights[i].color.g,lights[i].color.b);
5035 		gl.uniform3f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "lightAttenuation"+i), lights[i].constantAttenuation,lights[i].linearAttenuation,lights[i].quadraticAttenuation);
5036 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotCosCutOff"+i), lights[i].spotCosCutOff);
5037 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "spotExp"+i), lights[i].spotExponent);
5038 		gl.uniform1f(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "shadowbias"+i), lights[i].shadowBias);
5039 		gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "castshadows"+i), lights[i].castShadows);
5040 		    
5041 		//shadow code
5042 		if(lights[i].getCastShadows() && this.shadow) {
5043 			num=this.textures.length+(cnt++);
5044 			gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+num]);
5045 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, lights[i].texture);
5046 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5047 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.NEAREST_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
5048 			gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5049 		    
5050 			gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+num), num);
5051 		}
5052 	
5053 			
5054 	}
5055 	
5056 	var scale,offset;
5057 	for(i=0; i<this.layers.length;i++){
5058 		if(this.layers[i].animation) this.layers[i].animate();
5059 		scale=this.layers[i].getScale();
5060 		offset=this.layers[i].getOffset();		
5061 		gl.uniformMatrix4fv(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "layer"+i+"Matrix"), false, this.layers[i].getMatrix().glData());
5062 	}
5063     
5064 
5065 	for(var i=0; i<this.textures.length;i++){
5066 		gl.activeTexture(gl["TEXTURE"+i]);
5067 		//create the texture if it's not already created
5068 		if(!this.textures[i].glTexture) this.textures[i].glTexture=gl.createTexture();
5069 		//if the image is loaded then set in the texture data
5070 		if(this.textures[i].state==1){
5071 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.textures[i].glTexture);
5072 			gl.texImage2D(gl.TEXTURE_2D, 0, this.textures[i].image);
5073 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, gl.LINEAR);
5074 			gl.texParameteri(gl.TEXTURE_2D, gl.TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, gl.LINEAR_MIPMAP_LINEAR);
5075 			gl.generateMipmap(gl.TEXTURE_2D);
5076 			gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
5077 			this.textures[i].state=2;
5078 		}
5079 		gl.bindTexture(gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.textures[i].glTexture);
5080 		gl.uniform1i(GLGE.getUniformLocation(gl,shaderProgram, "TEXTURE"+i), i);
5081 	}	
5082 	
5083 };
5084 /**
5085 * Adds a new texture to this material
5086 * @param {String} image URL of the image to be used by the texture
5087 * @return {Number} index of the new texture
5088 */
5089 GLGE.Material.prototype.addTexture=function(texture){	
5090 	this.textures.push(texture);
5091 	texture.idx=this.textures.length-1;
5092 	return texture;
5093 };
5094 })(GLGE);

5097
